column3: Advance to Illinois Ave. - Collect $200 if you pass go
Advance to St. Charles Place - If you pass Go collect $200
Advance token to the nearest Utility. If unowned: you may buy it from the bank. If owned: roll the dice and pay the owner ten times the amount thrown
Advance token to the nearest Railroad and pay owner twice the rental to which he/she is otherwise entitled. If Railroad is unowned: you may buy it from the Bank.
Advance token to the nearest Railroad and pay owner twice the rental to which he/she is otherwise entitled. If Railroad is unowned: you may buy it from the Bank.
Get Out of Jail Free! Keep this card until needed or sold
Go directly to Jail - Do not pass Go. Do not collect $200
Make general repairs on all your property - For each house pay $25 - For each hotel $100
Take a walk on the Boardwalk - Advance token to Boardwalk
You have been elected Chairman of the Board - Pay each player $50
